transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Helllo?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Good morning sir, main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu. Aapne video meeting ke liye click kiya tha, toh abhi karni hai video meeting aapko?
Customer: Haan, kun bolo?
Executive: Aapne subah IndiaMART se baat ho rahi hai na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aapne subah IndiaMART se baat kar rahe hai, application se video meeting ke liye click kiya tha.
Customer: IndiaMART se baat ho rahi hai, main samajh gaya, main toh bas seekh raha hu.
Executive: Sir, video meeting ke liye aapne click kiya tha, toh abhi karni hai video meeting?
Customer: Haan, kar lijiye boliye.
Executive: Ji?
Customer: Kar lijiye, yes madam.
Executive: Toh abhi aap available hai, kar lijiye sir.
Customer: Ji, main available hu.
Executive: Toh aap login kar lijiye, main aapko video meeting ke liye link share kar du?
Customer: Kispe karoge? Kaunse WhatsApp pe karo is number pe.
Executive: Haan ji, WhatsApp pe share karungi. Ek baar aap mujhe apna WhatsApp number bata dijiye.
Customer: 7742067733.
Executive: 77, ek second sir, 77
Customer: 420
Executive: 420
Customer: 67733.
Executive: 67733.
Executive: Bhejiye main aapko link bhejti hu. 7742067733, right?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai, main abhi link share kar rahi hu.

Customer: Aur kuch cheeze bhi.
Customer: Bhejiye mere ko bhejiye.
Customer: Ji, ye gol hai na, melamine kam banan dega. Dairy product hai, kam banan dega. Bahut kam matra mein.
Customer: Aur agar dairy product khavla nahi regular.
Customer: Toh melamine bhi bahut kam, kam matlab generation hai.
Customer: Toh kam melamine banela nahi, ye toh bada hi difficult hai.
Customer: Dairy product se ye bhi hai.
Customer: Haan hai toh hai, badhiya cheez toh achi hai.
Customer: Thank you.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Thank you, main bhej rahi hu, check kijiye zara.

Customer: Isko bhi kuch dalenge.
Customer: Haan?

Customer: Madam, bahut time lag raha hai.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ek second sir, bhej rahi hu.
Customer: Hello, madam, bahut time lag raha hai.
Executive: Toh maine abhi dekhiye share kiya hai, check kijiye ho sake.
Customer: Aaya?
Customer: Link bhejo madam, ye toh aapne kya bheja hai? Type kar rahe ho, link, link bhejiye, link ye side.
Executive: Link hi bheja hai maine, aap ek baar check toh kijiye.
Customer: Check kar raha hu madam, check nahi ho raha isse, ye toh wo type wala hi hai.
Executive: Ek second.
Executive: Abhi dekhiye, ja raha hai?
Customer: Nahi madam, type wala aa raha hai dekho.
Executive: Link hoga toh. Aap ispe ek baar reply kijiye, uske baad join ho, usko kuch bhi reply kijiye ek baar.
Customer: Haan, lo koi dikkat nahi, bhejiye. Abhi dekhiye, abhi join hona.
Executive: Abhi aaya, abhi link bana hai. Abhi ho gaya? Theek hai, main join kar rahi hu, aap ek second rukhiyega, aapko puri detail share bata dijiye, bas ek second rukhiyega.

Customer: Aaya aapke paas request?

Executive: Aap join kar lijiye, main yaha se call rakhti hu, theek hai?
Customer: Okay sir, usme aawaz nahi aayegi madam?
Executive: Usme aawaz nahi aayegi toh aap yaha se continue karna chahte hai?
Customer: Haan, aap dekh lo video mein jo hai. Ya phir aapko video se comfortable ho, aapko koi dikkat nahi, chalo usi mein chalenge.
Customer: Haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs help joining video meeting.

- Customer says link is taking too long.



Resolution:

- Executive shared the link on WhatsApp.

- Executive guided customer to join video meeting.



Next Steps: 

- Executive asked customer to join video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meeting, whatsapp, link
